import React from "react"; import AddTodoModal from "../../../Utils/AddTodoModal"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { clearList } from "../../../Redux/todoSlice"; const TodoPage = () => { const { todoItems } = useSelector((store: any) => store.todo); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( <>

Admin Todo List

dispatch(clearList())}> Clear All Tasks

{todoItems.map((todo:any,index:number) => (

{todo.todoTitle}

{todo.todoDesc}

Created At : {todo.todoCreatedAt}
))}
); }; export default TodoPage;
